about.summary: Find pyspark to make it importable.

name: findspark
raw_recipe:
{% set version = "1.0.0" %}

package:
  name: findspark
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  fn: findspark-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  url: https://pypi.io/packages/source/f/findspark/findspark-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  md5: 3f5eed4c63e2625070a146d980760e45

build:
  number: 0
  script: python setup.py install

requirements:
  build:
    - python

  run:
    - python

test:
  imports:
    - findspark

about:
  home: https://github.com/minrk/findspark
  license: BSD 3-clause
  summary: 'Find pyspark to make it importable.'

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - mariusvniekerk
    - minrk
